divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing out in my front yard observing the moving stars in the sky as usual for about an hour or so win this round dark dull gray object swooped down and vanished at first i was kinda shocked thin i seen it 2 or 3 more times about this time it was around 2:10 but each time i seen it was for just a few seconds but it looked like it was in front of my face well i changed location on top of a hill in my front yard after i was admiring the strange moving stars as usual win the dull gray object became more visual this time but it appeared much smaller this time and i was facing a different direction in the sky i watched it looked like it was glitching threw the night sky thin it was gone..i have witnessed multiple encounters of strange objects in Osgood on multiple occasions i dont under stand how people dont believe something strange is going on in the sky's at night and thin again those people probably never actually pay to much attention or as opened minded as to what is rill happening out in our souler system planes dont just stop in mid flight and vanish.. i mean if we have invited some new technology i would love to be enlighten but in till that happens i will keep looking for unexplained encounters on what i seen and the strange stars that i allows see at night...
trends: There has been one other sighting in Osgood
There were no other sightings in Osgood on or around October 5th 2013
Summary: dull gray object dipe down and disipeard and i seen it about 4 or five more times with in a few hours
